## Concept
Exploration of the Ghost Crab's burrow dimensions and burrow morphology

### Goals of Crab Analysis Project 
1. Load data from [Ghost Crab Burrow Morphology and Distribution](https://doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.6895109)
2. Analyze burrow dimensions based off different factors 
3. Plot and graph visualizations

### Required Packages
```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```
